titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment or recess of the Senate and an adjournment of the House of Representatives.
A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment or recess of the Senate and an adjournment of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Declares that when the Senate recesses or adjourns on any day from Thursday, September 18, 2014, through Tuesday, October 14, 2014, it stand recessed or adjourned until 12:00 noon on Wednesday, October 15, 2014, and that when it recesses or adjourns on Wednesday, October 15, 2014, it stand adjourned until 12:00 noon on Wednesday, November 12, 2014.
Declares that when the House adjourns on any legislative day from Thursday, September 18, 2014, through Friday, November 7, 2014, it stand adjourned until 2:00 p.m. on Wednesday, November 12, 2014.
